name: The Milk Light Cathedral
description:
You've been here before, the Milk Light Cathedral is that little spot in the woods where you might stop off on a hike. A brief moment of self-reflection as you pass through its ancient walls. 

The booklet is a 5-spread description of this lonely ruin in each season, and a small thing to think about. A visit here might help you understand your characters more deeply, or think on your own relationship with time.
